description: After impressing you all on our sister site, FitYoungMen, this hunky straight triathlete agreed to do a photo shoot for EnglishLads. In this bonus video, of the photo shoot, Brendan seems eager to please, by fetching a dildo from his bag and putting it to good use! His cock is rock solid while he does this - until he shoots a nice load on his abs.
title: Bonus Video of Brendan's Photo Shoot - Straight lad playing with a dildo!
